name: Streak!
description: Personal Streak! Prove you're the best and start a streak!

show-in-pause.name: Show Streak in Pause Menu
show-in-pause.description: Displays your current streak and star progress in the pause menu.

pause-pos-x.name: Pause Menu X Position
pause-pos-x.description: The horizontal position of the streak display. A higher number moves it to the right.

pause-pos-y.name: Pause Menu Y Position
pause-pos-y.description: The vertical position of the streak display. A higher number moves it up.
